entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
